name: Star Trek Online
description: Uses the old Cryptic Launcher (No Arc, No Steam)
notes:
- Starting the game for the first time can need very long, please be patient
- Short freezes when going to a map or seeing effects the first time, this will get better after playing a while
content:
files:
- game: http://files.startrekonline.com/launcher/Star%20Trek%20Online.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Star Trek Online.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    key: winemenubuilder.exe
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: ''
- task:
    description: Setting required Windows version (Win10)
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: win10
- task:
    app: sandbox
    description: Disabling unused WINE features
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- move:
    description: Moving launcher into place
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Star Trek Online.exe
    src: $game
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
